mapper.insert: insert into pool_party (POOL_SEQ, POOL_NAME, POOL_COMMENT, POOL_PIC, CITY_SEQ, MANAGER_EMAIL, POOL_PUBLIC_YN) values (#{poolSeq }, #{poolName }, #{poolComment }, #{poolPic }, #{citySeq }, #{managerEmail }, #{poolPublic_yn } )
mapper.select: SELECT POOL_SEQ as poolSeq, POOL_NAME as poolName, POOL_COMMENT as poolComment, POOL_PIC as poolPic, CITY_SEQ as citySeq, MANAGER_EMAIL as managerEmail, POOL_PUBLIC_YN as poolPublic_yn, CRT_DATE as crtDate FROM POOL_PARTY WHERE POOL_SEQ = #{string }
